post.body: I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
is wishing everyone a Very Happy, healthy and prosperous New year!
Get your Aussie Wild Birds Calendar from: http://wingedhearts.org/calendar2009
is glad Christine (in NY) can talk to Maggie magpie (in Qld) and help him get better
is cooking a special Indian meal for friends
is wishing everyone happy holidays and a Merry Christmas!
has met the most gorgeous baby flying fox - (bats are also winged hearts.....)
is creating a slideshow about koels wooing.....
is thankful for the rains and glad that the burnt umber landscape has turned to a velvet green and purple, with hints of gold and pink...
is thankful for the rains and glad that the burnt umber landscape has turned to a velvet green and purple, with hints of gold and pink.....
awaits Marc Beckoff on emotional lives of animals & Ron House on the wild birds on 8 Dec- 12.00 EST http;//consciousanimalradio.com
is finalising the Australian Wild Birds 2009 Calendar
is deeply saddened by events in Mumbai
thanks all her family, friends, colleagues and pets and wishes all her American firends a Very Happy Thanksgiving & very best of the season
is writing about the Valley of birds
looking forward to Christine's show on turkeys and Ron's interview on Conscious Animal Radio on Monday (http://consciousanimalradio.com)
congratulates Christine Agro on being featured host on Blogtalk radio for Conscious Animal Radio http://consciousanimalradio.com
thanks JaSue for her beautiful comments at http://tinyurl.com/66ecwn
finds the corellas are negotiating nesting trees with the galahs
is wondering what two koels are doing in her backyard...
